Title: Argentina’s Enarsa seeks two September-October LNG cargoes for Escobar
Description: Argentina’s state-owned Energia Argentina, or Enarsa, has issued a tender to buy two LNG cargoes for delivery in September and October to its 6.1 mtpa Escobar LNG receiving terminal. The tender closes on Aug. 28.
Author: CK

Title: QatarEnergy, Kuwait’s KPC agree on a 15-year LNG supply deal for 3 mtpa
Description: QatarEnergy has agreed to supply state-owned Kuwait Petroleum Corp. with 3 mtpa of LNG over 15 years starting in January 2025 to support the country’s growing power demand.
Author: CK

Title: Russia’s sanctioned Arctic LNG 2 project receives a third LNG tanker
Description: A third LNG tanker has called at Russia’s sanctioned 19.8 mtpa Arctic LNG 2 project on the Gydan Peninsula, following the arrival of the 138,000 m3 Pioneer and 137,200 m3 Asya Energy earlier this month to load the project’s first two cargoes.
Author: CK

Title: Newly sanctioned Pioneer LNG ship spoofs AIS again; caught by satellite in likely STS transfer
Description: The newly sanctioned 138,000 m3 Pioneer LNG tanker that lifted a cargo earlier this month from the sanctioned 19.8 mtpa Arctic LNG 2 project is once again transmitting false signals of its actual location to conceal the very high likelihood of a ship-to-ship transfer of LNG in the Mediterranean Sea with the 150,000 m3 New Energy LNG tanker.
Author: CK

Title: Power producer B.Grimm imports its first LNG cargo into Thailand from Queensland Curtis LNG
Description: Bangkok-based power producer B.Grimm received its first LNG cargo at the PTT-operated Map Ta Phut LNG terminal in Rayong yesterday, marking its debut as one of Thailand’s LNG importers.
Author: CK
